name: Safari Desert SUV Adventure
description:
Safari Desert SUV Adventure!!!
Go to the endless sands of the desert on a powerful SUV!
Feel in a dangerous race on the high dunes.
Become the best in the class drift, ahead of all competitors!
Go through the stretches of the route, entering the most protracted drifts.
Do not give yourself a lead, be the best!
Be careful not to turn the car over unsteady sand.
Features
Crazy off-road and desert adventure
Clear checkpoints
Marvelous asphalt track
High quality graphics
Imperturbable and Realistic Sound Effects
Addictive and smooth control in Gameplay
